channel.title: [317/Delta]How to add animation to wings?[317/Delta]

item.title: [317/Delta]How to add animation to wings?[317/Delta]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

OK i have recently added added wings of different assortments onto my Client and Server…
i have them set in the cape spot as if they were capes, like they should be.
but how do i make them to where…when you wear them, you fly…
Like Weps. look like…

public int GetWepAnim(int id) { if(id == -1) // unarmed { return 422; } if(id == 837) { return 1084; } if(id == 3190 || id == 3192 || id == 3194 || id == 3196 || id == 3198 || id== 2697 || id == 3202 || id == 3204) // halberds { return 440; }
and such as that,but…I have tried “public int GetCapeAnim”
and it does not work…So can anyone help?I am using a Delta base.

Read full topic
